text: Yu or Ju (Юю; italics: Юю) is a letter of the Cyrillic script used in East Slavic and Bulgarian alphabets. In English, Yu is an commonly romanized as (or ). In turn, is used, where it is available in transcriptions of English letter (in open syllables), and also of the digraph. The sound , like in French and in German, may also be approximated by the letter .
title: Yu (Cyrillic)
